body:
Hello @datapythonista! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/util/test_deprecate.py`](https://github.com/datapythonista/pandas/blob/24c20eccafebe9a535991521242f39a6e1389db5/pandas/tests/util/test_deprecate.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/util/_decorators.py`](https://github.com/datapythonista/pandas/blob/24c20eccafebe9a535991521242f39a6e1389db5/pandas/util/_decorators.py) !

# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24215?src=pr&el=h1) Report

> The diff coverage is `81.81%`.

- Misses       4030    29504    +25474
